*div1 type="summary"* *p*Pettus v. Reed, May 21, 1827. Judicial procedure.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Freeman Pettus*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*versus*/p* *p**person_mentioned*John C Reed*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Sir Take notice that pursuant to the order of the *person_mentioned*Honble Superior Court of this *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* I shall on the *date_mentioned n="09-10-1826">Tenth day of September */date_mentioned*and on the *date_mentioned n="09-11-1826">following day*/date_mentioned* *location_mentioned*at the house of *person_mentioned*William G, Doyle Esqr*/person_mentioned* of Lawrence County in the State of Alabama*/location_mentioned* a *person_mentioned*Justice of the peace*/person_mentioned* in and for said State proceed to take the deposition of *person_mentioned*Martin Sims*/person_mentioned* and of *person_mentioned*William Sims*/person_mentioned* of said *location_mentioned*County */location_mentioned*before the said *person_mentioned*Wm. G Doyle*/person_mentioned* and that on the *date_mentioned n="10-10-1827">10 day of October next*/date_mentioned* I shall also proceed to take the depositions of*person_mentioned* Mrs Price*/person_mentioned* and of ------ *person_mentioned*Newell*/person_mentioned* of *person_mentioned*Bayou Coti*/person_mentioned* in the *person_mentioned*State of Louisiana*/person_mentioned* at the *location_mentioned*house of the said *person_mentioned*Mrs------Price */person_mentioned**/location_mentioned*at *person_mentioned*Bayou Coti*/person_mentioned* afd before some *person_mentioned*officer */person_mentioned*properly authorised to take the same on which occasions you can attend if you think proper*/p*
*p*And take notice that said deposition will be adduced in Evidence on the part of the pff on the Trial of the issue in this matter at the Term of the sd *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Supr Court*/person_mentioned* of this Colony*/location_mentioned* to be held in the Town of *location_mentioned*San felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* on the *date_mentioned n="02-01-1828">1 Monday in feby 1828—*/date_mentioned**location_mentioned*San felepe do Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="05-21-1827">21 May (1827)*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Freeman Pettus*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
